sentences.en: Altman strips away the pretence and mythology to expose the film industry as a business like any other.
sentences.cn: 奥尔特曼揭去了电影产业的伪装和神秘光环，暴露了其与其他产业并无二致的商业本质。

sentences.en: Davis asked, making a playful pretence at seizing Castle's briefcase.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯一边说, 一边开玩笑地假装要抢卡斯尔的公文包.

sentences.en: He didn't like the food, but he made a pretence of eating some of it as he was a guest.
sentences.cn: 他不喜欢这道菜, 但因为他是客人,所以假装吃了一些.

sentences.en: His followers pressed him, telling him his magic was all a pretence.
sentences.cn: 跟随他的人硬要他等一等, 激他说他的魔法全是假的.

sentences.en: His religion was a mere pretence.
If she takes against someone, she makes no attempt at pretence.
sentences.cn: 如果她不喜欢某个人, 也毫不掩饰自己的想法.

sentences.en: It was all an elaborate pretence .
sentences.cn: 这一切都是精心的伪装。

sentences.en: She isn't really ill; it's only pretence.
sentences.cn: 她并非真的有病, 只是装出来的.

sentences.en: The family depended on his ability to wangle a few dollars occasionally . With this money, they would eat well and dress well for a while , making a pretence of affluence.
sentences.cn: 一家人全靠他在外面讹个钱,诈个财, 吃点好的,穿点好的, 装门面.

sentences.en: The theory made the greatest pretence of having a scientific foundation.
sentences.cn: 那学说号称最具有科学基础.
他们的友善态度只不过是装出来的。

sentences.en: They are making a pretence of equity with serious faces.
sentences.cn: 他们板起面孔,装作大公无私的样子.

sentences.en: We have to go along with the pretence that things are getting better.
sentences.cn: 我们只得一直假装情形在好转。

sentences.en: Welland made a pretence of writing a note in his pad.
sentences.cn: 韦兰假装在便笺薄上做笔记。

sentences.en: Within thirty seconds any pretence was always unnecessary.
sentences.cn: 不消三十秒,所有借口全成了多余的废物.

sentences.en: You shouldn't scold him on the slightest pretence.
sentences.cn: 你不应该以一点点借口就责骂他.

words.tran_cn: 借口；虚假；炫耀；自吹（等于pretence）
自负；要求；主张；借口；骄傲
假装（pretend的过去式和过去分词）；装扮

trans.tran_cn: 假装，作假，借口，口实，虚伪，虚饰
trans.tran_en: a way of behaving which is intended to make people believe something that is not true
